meanings.sent1: The unpliant metal rod could not be bent.
meanings.sent2: The unpliant tree branch snapped in the strong wind.
meanings.sent3: The unpliant ruler refused to bend even a little.
meanings.sent4: Her unpliant attitude mirrored the stiffness of the iron bar.
meanings.sent5: The unpliant wire held its shape without yielding.

meanings.sent1: His unpliant decision remained unchanged despite the arguments.
meanings.sent2: The unpliant student refused to follow the crowd.

meanings.sent4: Her unpliant beliefs were like a fortress against outside influence.

meanings.definition: Not adaptable or willing to change.
meanings.sent1: The unpliant old man stuck to his routine without deviation.
meanings.sent2: The unpliant system resisted any attempts at modification.
meanings.sent3: The unpliant clock refused to adjust to daylight saving time.
meanings.sent4: Her unpliant nature was like a rock in the face of change.
meanings.sent5: The unpliant schedule was set in stone, unyielding to alterations.
